python.code: """ References: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M%C3%B6bius_function References: wikipedia:square free number python/black : True flake8 : True """ from maths.is_square_free import is_square_free from maths.prime_factors import prime_factors def mobius(n: int) -> int: """ Mobius function >>> mobius(24) 0 >>> mobius(-1) 1 >>> mobius('asd') Traceback (most recent call last): ... TypeError: '<=' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'str' >>> mobius(10**400) 0 >>> mobius(10**-400) 1 >>> mobius(-1424) 1 >>> mobius([1, '2', 2.0]) Traceback (most recent call last): ... TypeError: '<=' not supported between instances of 'int' and 'list' """ factors = prime_factors(n) if is_square_free(factors): return -1 if len(factors) % 2 else 1 return 0 if __name__ == "__main__": import doctest doctest.testmod()
